front.title: Proposed Issues and Changes for IDNA - An Overview

abstract.t: A recent IAB report identified issues that have been raised with Internationalized Domain Names (IDNs) some of which require tuning of the existing protocols and the tables on which they depend. Based on intensive discussion by an informal design team, this document further explains some of the issues that have been encountered and provides explanatory material for some of the proposals that are being made.
